events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from the candidate and the details look promising to proceed with the next steps.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the candidateâ€™s skills and experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering profiles has been assigned to the candidate to manage the hiring process effectively.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well, confirming their background in software engineering and enthusiasm for the role.
The candidate responded positively to our follow-up questions and expressed strong interest in moving forward with a technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess their software engineering skills in detail.
